testcase.classname: Register: user could register with new account
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully

testcase.classname: Login: users could use their accounts to login successfully
testcase.name: user enter valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with Valid userName and Password............................passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: Login: users could use their accounts to login successfully
testcase.name: user enter InValid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with InValid userName and Password..........................passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed
